Articles.Content:
I am having an issue with saving in the very 1st tutorial. Just

wont save, no error nothing.

are you supposed too be able too save in tut?

i just started having the same problem, but in career. It wont make "quicksave #" after quicksave #10. It makes em, i saw it in load screen the last time i tried making a save, but when reloading the game, its gone and the quick "quicksave" too from inflight.

 

i havent tried deleting old saves too "free" up Space yet. Anyone having this issue With less then 10 saves?

seems like i just cant progress anymore

Edited July 19, 2016 by DaCana
ms
